DOC.criteria: Men postmenopausal woman BMI 2735.9 kg/m2 Cigarette smoking and/or nicotine replacement use Individuals take estrogen Use cholesterollowering medication Use blood pressurelowering medication Regular use stomach acidlowering medication laxative ( include fiber supplement ) Cardiovascular ( heart ) disease Gastrointestinal disease Kidney disease Endocrine disease : include diabetes , untreated thyroid disease Rheumatoid arthritis Active treatment type cancer , except basal cell carcinoma , within 1 year prior study admission Systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg Regular use oral steroid Regular daily intake â‰¥ 2 alcoholic drink Infrequent excessive number regular bowel movement Illicit drug use Vegetarians No fish oil supplement ( include cod liver oil ) one month prior study admission No dietary supplement , include contain vitamin , mineral , herb , plant concentrate ( include garlic , gingko , St. John 's wort ) homeopathic remedy , one month prior study admission
